entry.value: select to_json(ttable.*) from (select now() tstamp, ? p1 ,? p2 ,? p3) ttable

select array_to_json(array_agg(ttemp.*)) from ( select xst.tscenario_name as key, xst.tscenario_description as description from xeai_stub_tscenario xst where xst.tscenario_context is not null and xst.tscenario_context != '' order by xst.tscenario_name ) ttemp
select to_json(ttemp.*) from ( select xst.tscenario_payload rqo, xst.tscenario_context context, xst.tscenario_payload_type rqoType from xeai_stub_tscenario xst where xst.tscenario_name = ? ) ttemp
select array_to_json(array_agg(ttemp.*)) from ( select event_name as key from xeai_event order by event_name ) ttemp
select array_to_json(array_agg(ttemp.*)) from ( select distinct audit_type as key from xeai_audit_log_config order by audit_type ) ttemp
select to_json(ttable.*) from ( select payload from xeai_audit_log where xeai_id = ? and event_name = ? and audit_type = ? ) ttable
select to_json(ttable.*) from ( select severity||', '||cause "error_detail" from xeai_audit_error_log where xeai_id = ? and event_name = ? ) ttable

select array_to_json(array_agg(ttemp.*)) from ( select xf.*, xb.xeai_bus_group, xb.xeai_bus_cipher from xeai_flcontainer xf join xeai_bus xb on xb.xeai_bus_code = xf.container_bus order by xf.container_owner, xf.container_flgroup, xf.container_flsequence
) ttemp

select array_to_json(array_agg(ttemp.*)) from ( select xb.xeai_bus_code, xc.context_site, xc.context_alias, xbc.context_level, xbc.context_sequence, xbc.context_code, xbc.xeai_bus_code_binder from xeai_context xc join xeai_buscontext xbc on xc.context_code = xbc.context_code join xeai_bus xb on xbc.xeai_bus_code = xb.xeai_bus_code where xb.xeai_bus_code = ? order by xbc.context_level, xbc.context_sequence ) ttemp
select array_to_json(array_agg(ttemp.*)) from ( select name as key from xeai_owner order by 1 ) ttemp
select array_to_json(array_agg(ttemp.*)) from ( select group_key as key from xeai_group WHERE group_identifier LIKE ? order by group_key asc ) ttemp
select to_json(ttemp.*) from ( select xt.transform_template as context from xeai_transform xt WHERE xt.transform_id= to_number(?,'999999999') ) ttemp
select to_json(ttemp.*) from ( select xo.*, xla.* from xeai_owner xo, (select * from xeai_lookup_archcomp where name = 'WACONSOLE.MASTERPATH') xla where xo.name = xla.key and xo.name = ? ) ttemp
select to_json(ttemp.*) from( select message_template, message_sample from xeai_message_versioning where message_group = ? and message_name = ? ) ttemp
select array_to_json(array_agg(ttemp.*)) from ( SELECT context_sequence() ) ttemp
select to_json(ttemp.*) from ( SELECT bus_sequence() ) ttemp

select to_json(ttemp.*) from( select xc.context_alias, xc.context_code, (select count(1) from xeai_buscontext where context_code = xc.context_code and xeai_bus_code = ?) colleteral from ( select * from xeai_context where context_site = ?) xc ) ttemp
